name: Survive the Ghouls
description:
Welcome to my submission for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3! 

For the theme, I've made a game where you must flee a haunted mine, and hold on to as much humanity as possible!

Unfortunately, I did not get as much done in the jam window as I would have liked, but I hope you enjoy my game all the same!

Feedback is encouraged and appreciated.

Enjoy playing!

Controls: WASDMoveEInteract(When Prompted)Left ClickShoot Links: My Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarnesCoding
